messages.msgId0: {name} je snimio/la {numPhotos, plural, =0 {niti jednu fotografiju} =1 {jednu fotografiju} other {# fotografija}} {takenDate, date, long}.
messages.about_p0-0: MapStore je framework za izgradnju web mapping aplikacija koristeći standardne mapping biblioteke kao što su
messages.about_ul0_li0: MapViewer je jednostavni preglednik predefiniranih karata (po izboru pohranjenih u bazi koristeći GeoStore)
messages.about_ul0_li1: MapPublisher je razvijen za jednostavno i intuitivno kreiranje, spremanje i dijeljenje karata i kombinacija podataka dobivenih odabirom sadržaja koji dolaze iz standardnih izvora kao što su Google Maps i OpenStreetMap ili putem servisa koje pružaju organizacije koristeći otvorene protokole kao što su OGC WMS, WFS, WMTS ili TMS itd. Za više informacija provjerite
messages.about_p3: MapStore je slobodan softver otvorenoga koda, baziran je na OpenLayers, Leaflet i ReactJS bibliotekama i licenciran je pod jednostavnom BSD licencom.
messages.showEmptyMessageGFI: Prikaži poruku o praznom rezultatu pretrage u info panel-u

cookie.info: Ova stranica koristi kolačiće za pružanje boljeg korisničkog iskustva i funkcionalnosti. Postavke kolačića mogu se kontrolirati i prilagoditi u vašem web pregledniku.

home.shortDescription:
Moderan webmapping pomoću OpenLayers, Leaflet i React
pregledaj stranicu sa dokumentacijom
home.description:
MapStore je razvijen za jednostavno i intuitivno kreiranje, spremanje i dijeljenje karata i kombinacija podataka dobivenih odabirom sadržaja koji dolaze iz standardnih izvora kao što su Google Maps i OpenStreetMap ili putem servisa koje pružaju organizacije koristeći otvorene protokole kao što su OGC WMS, WFS, WMTS ili TMS itd.
Posjetite početnu stranicu za više informacija.
home.footerDescription: <small>GeoSolutions S.a.s. | Via di Montramito 3/A, 55054 Massarosa (Lucca) - Italy info@geo-solutions.it | Tel: +39 0584 962313 | Fax: +39 0584 1660272</small>

tms.urlTemplateHint:
Template URL for your custom TMS service, with the possibility to insert variables (expressed using curly braces, e.g. {var_name}) that will be replaced by the application.
. The {x}, {y} and {z} variables are reserved for tile grid coordinate values. You can also use variable {s} for subdomains. Any other variable specified in the URL must be specified also in options inside "Custom TMS Configuration" (Advanced Settings)
tms.customTMSConfigurationHint:
Options can contain:

  • "subdomains": ['a', 'b']: used for multiple domains, replacingthe {s} in URL template
  • "maxNativeZoom": 20: max zoom from the server
tms.forceDefaultTileGridDescription: Use the global projection's tile grid instead of the origin and resolutions provided by the server. This is useful for some TMS services that advertise wrong origin or resolutions.

tileprovider.tooltip: x,y,z are tile position, s is the sub-domain (default)

Mogući uzroci su:

  • WFS servis nije dostupan
  • WPS proces gs:aggregate nije dostupan

• .0%: rounded percentage, '12%'
  • .2s:SI-prefix with two significant digits, '42M'

More information about formatting syntax here.
advanced.formulaExamples:
Transform the value using a formula. Use the variable value in the expression:
Examples

  • value / 100
More information about the syntax here.

intro.title: Dobrodošli u MapStore
intro.text: framework za izradu web mapping aplikacija koristeći standardne biblioteke kao što su OpenLayers i Leaflet.

drawerMenu.title: Glavni izbornik
drawerMenu.text: Ovdje možete pronaći informacije i alate za upravljanje slojevima

searchBar.title: Traka za pretragu
searchBar.text: Upišite adresu mjesta za pretragu npr. 'Ilica, Zagreb'. Također, možete upisati i koordinate u slijedećem formatu: 43.87,10.20

home.title: Početna stranica
home.text: Kliknite za povratak na početnu stranicu

searchButton.title: Pretraga
searchButton.text: Kliknite za otvaranje take za pretragu, potom adresu mjesta za pretragu npr. 'Ilica, Zagreb'. Također, možete upisati i koordinate u slijedećem formatu: 43.87,10.20

burgerMenu.title: Izbornik opcija
burgerMenu.text: ovdje možete pronaći postavke i pomoć

fullscreen.title: Puni ekran
fullscreen.text: Kliknite za prikaz na čitavom ekranu

identifyButton.title: Informacije o objektima
identifyButton.text: Kliknite za aktiviranje alata, zatim kliknite na kartu da bi dobili informacije o prikazanim slojevima

mapType.title: Biblioteke
mapType.text: Možete birati između Leaflet i OpenLayers biblioteka za renderiranje vaših karata

mapsGrid.title: Karte
mapsGrid.text: Ovdje su neki od primjera za. Kliknite na sličicu za isprobavanje demo karata.

examples.title: Prilagođena aplikacija
examples.text: Možete koristiti MapStore komponente i pluginove kako bi izgradili vlastite aplikacije

introCesium.title: Upute za 3D prikaz
introCesium.text: Kliknite na dugme Dalje za početak tutorijala

cesium.title: Interakcija sa kartom
cesium.twoDragSame: Povlačenje s dva prsta, isti smjer
cesium.twoDragOpposite: Povlačenje s dva prsta, suprotni smjer
cesium.rightClick: Desni klik + povlačenje, ili skrolanje mišem
cesium.middleClick: Srednji klik + povlačenje ili CTRL + Lijevi/Desni klik + povlačenje

cesiumCompass.title: Busola
cesiumCompass.text: Možete koristiti busolu za kruženje oko zemaljske kugle. Povuci za rotiranje karte

cesiumNavigation.title: Navigacija
cesiumNavigation.text: Ovdje možete naći dugmad za približavanje i udaljavanje sadržaja karte

dashboardNav.title: Navigacijska traka
dashboardNav.text: Ovdje možete pronaći odabir jezika, prijavu, poveznicu na početnu stranicu i mogućnosti menija

dashboardContainer.title: Kontrolna ploča
dashboardContainer.text:
Kontrolna ploča u MapStore daje skup podataka prikladno prikupljenih za prikaz zbirnih podataka u jedinstvenom prikazu. Geografski podaci prikazani na karti mogu se postaviti paralelno s povezanim atributnim tabelama, grafikonima i drugim, s ciljem povezivanja različitih vrsta informacija, s ciljem prikaza statističkih pojedinosti i tekstualnih opisa povezanih s određenim kontekstom.

Svi korisnici mogu vizualizirati i interaktivno raditi s objavljenim kontrolnim pločama, ali samo korisnici koji imaju dopuštenje za uređivanje mogu dodavati, organizirati, promijeniti veličinu ili brisati widgete unutar nadzorne ploče

dashboardAddWidget.title: Dodaj widget
dashboardAddWidget.text: Za dodavanje widget-a na kontrolnu ploču, možete kliknuti na + dugme

dashboardBuilder.title: Stvori novi widget
dashboardBuilder.text: Možete odabrati koju vrstu widgeta želite, te ga dodati na nadzornu ploču odabirom jedne od stavki na popisu

dashboardAddChart.title: Grafikon
dashboardAddChart.text:
Ovo je widget koji prikazuje i agregira podatke u grafikon pita, linijske ili stupčane grafikone.

Koraci:

  • Odaberi vektorski sloj
  • Odaberi tip grafikona
  • Prilagodi podatke grafikona
  • Spremi i dodaj na ploču

dashboardAddText.title: Tekst
dashboardAddText.text:
Dodaj svoj tekst na ploču.

Koraci:

  • Uredi tekst u uređivaču
  • Spremi i dodaj na kontrolu ploču

dashboardAddTable.title: Tablica
dashboardAddTable.text:
Dodaj atributnu tabelu koja sadrži podatke odabranoga vektorskog sloja na ploču. Također, možete filtrirati podatke kako bi prilagodili tablicu.

Koraci:

  • Odaberi vektorski sloj
  • Prilagodi podatke tablice
  • Spremi i dodaj na ploču

dashboardAddCounter.title: Brojač
dashboardAddCounter.text:
Dodaj novi brojač na ploču. Brojač će prikazivati agregirane brojčane vrijednosti iz odabranoga vektorskog sloja.

Koraci:

  • Odaberi vektorski sloj
  • Prilagodi podatke brojača
  • Spremi i dodaj na ploču

dashboardAddMap.title: Karta
dashboardAddMap.text:
Dodaj novu interaktivnu kartu na ploču. Možete dodati više od jedne karte sa mogućnošću povezivanja sa ostalim widgetima. Nakon spremanja prve karte, widget legende će biti pridodan listi. Legenda će prikazivati podatke povezane sa prikazanom kartom.

Koraci:

  • Odaberi kartu
  • Poboljšaj kartu dodavanjem novih slojeva
  • Spremi i dodaj na ploču

intro.title: Context Creation Tutorial
intro.text: This is a step-by-step wizard to create and edit MapStore contexts

stepsOverview.title: Context Creator Steps
stepsOverview.text:
Every context is created in three steps:

  • General Settings
  • Configure Map
  • Configure Plugins

next.title: Navigation: Next
next.text: Press this button to go to the next step. If the button is disabled, it means that either the data you configured is being validated, or it is invalid.

back.title: Navigation: Back
back.text: Press this button to go to the previous step.

close.title: Navigation: Close
close.text: Press this button to leave the context creation process without saving. This can be done at any point in the creation process.

fields.title: General Settings
fields.text: The first creation step requires to specify name of the context, that defines also its unique URL, and title that will be used as the title of the browser's window when context is opened and active. Note: The context name can only contain latin letters, digits 0-9 and underscore character. The window title cannot be empty.

showTutorial.title: Show Tutorial
showTutorial.text: If you wish to go through the tutorial for a step again, you can do it at any time by pressing this button.

intro.title: Configure Map
intro.text: In this step, using MapStore map viewer tools you can configure the default map that will be opened upon accessing the context.

reloadMap.title: Reload Map Button
reloadMap.text: If you wish to discard all the changes you've made to the map so far and start over, you can do so by pressing this button.

intro.title: Configure Plugins
intro.text: This step allows you to configure plugins that will be present in the context.

availablePlugins.title: Available Plugins
availablePlugins.text: This list contains MapStore plugins that can be added to a context. To select a plugin simply click on it's card. Also, if you hold down your CTRL key, you can select multiple plugins.

pluginManipulation.title: Moving Plugins
pluginManipulation.text:
Once selected, available plugins can be moved into the right column, making them enabled in the context. Some plugins require other plugins to function, in that case they will be enabled automatically alongside plugins you explicitly enabled.

Plugins can also be moved from "enabled" column to "available" column to remove plugins from the context. If you remove a plugin, all the plugins it requires to function will be disabled as well, unless there are currently enabled plugins that also require such a plugin.

enabledPlugins.title: Enabled Plugins
enabledPlugins.text: This list contains MapStore plugins that are in the context. Each plugin here can be further configured using tool buttons.

userPlugin.title: Plugin Tools: User Plugins
userPlugin.text: By pressing this button, you can allow a plugin to be enabled/disabled by users, making it a user plugin. Such plugins will be shown within User Extensions plugin. This plugin is automatically added to the context if there is at least one enabled user plugin.

userPluginCheckbox.title: Plugin Tools: User Plugins
userPluginCheckbox.text: If a plugin is a user plugin, then this checkbox controls whether a user plugin should be enabled automatically on context load.

cfgTool.title: Plugin Tools: Configuration Tool
cfgTool.text: Pressing this button makes an editor appear, where you can edit the plugin's default configuration.

cfgEditor.title: Plugin Tools: Configuration Editor
cfgEditor.text: The editor supports syntax highlight. All your changes will be saved continuously as you edit. If the configuration contains a syntax error, you will be informed appropriately. The error must be fixed before proceeding.

documentationTool.title: Plugin Tools: Documentation
documentationTool.text: Pressing this button will take you to the plugin's documentation page where you can look up info on what the plugin does and what configuration parameters it supports.

mapTemplatesTool.title: Plugin Tools: Map Templates
mapTemplatesTool.text: Map Templates plugin also has a special tool that allows you to configure map templates that will be accessible within the context.

extensions.title: Extensions
extensions.text: MapStore also supports uploading custom extenion bundles. You can do so by clicking this button.

extensionsDelete.title: Extensions
extensionsDelete.text: Already uploaded extensions can be deleted at any time by pressing this button.

geostoryIntro.title: Story Tutorial
geostoryIntro.text:
Overview of story functionalities

Explore the related user guide here

geostoryViewHeader.title: Header
geostoryViewHeader.text: Here you can find language selector, login, homepage link and options menu

geostoryViewNavItems.title: Navigable items
geostoryViewNavItems.text: Here you can find items present in the story that you can use to navigate/jump to. It shows also the current position in the story

geostoryViewNavTitle.title: Story Title
geostoryViewNavTitle.text: Here you can see the story title

geostoryViewNavLogo.title: Story Logo
geostoryViewNavLogo.text: Here you can see the story logo

geostoryViewContent.title: Story Content
geostoryViewContent.text: This will be the content of the story

geostoryViewEditButton.title: Edit Story
geostoryViewEditButton.text: By clicking here you can edit the story content and settings

geostoryEditSidebar.title: Sidebar
geostoryEditSidebar.text:
In the Sidebar you can see an overview of the story where each item is identified by a different icon or with a preview in case of images or maps

Here you can:

  • Change title to each section or content title
  • Reorder by with drag drop sections and its content
  • Zoom to a specific content with the hourglass button

geostoryEditSidebarToolbar.title: Tools
geostoryEditSidebarToolbar.text:
From left to right:

  • Delete a selected section
  • Go in view mode
  • Edit settings
  • Collapse/expand all

geostoryEditSidebarSettings.title: Story Settings
geostoryEditSidebarSettings.text:
Here you can:

  • Show/hide/edit the story title
  • Edit the theme of the story
  • Show/hide/edit the story logo
  • Customize the navigation bar in view mode

For more info see the related user guide here

geostoryEditContainer.title: Story Content
geostoryEditContainer.text:
Here you can see the content of the story, edit it by adding or removing sections, paragraphs etc.

Each toolbar allows you to manipulate the story content, for example:

  • change media source
  • make the section to adapt to content height or to fit the view vertically
  • make the background to cover or not the container space
  • change size
  • align the container (available if size is not full)
  • change theme

this icon will allow you to edit the related map

Tip: Each tool has a tooltip, hover on it with the mouse to see more

geostoryEditAddbar.title: Add New Content
geostoryEditAddbar.text:
Here you can add different kind of scetions:

  • Title section
  • Paragraph section
  • Immersive Section
  • Media Section
  • Web Page Section

geostoryEditMediaEditor.title: Media Editor
geostoryEditMediaEditor.text:
Using the the Media Editor you can include in the story different kind of media contents like:

  • images
  • videos
  • maps

For more info see the related user guide here

settings.templateTooltip: This setting allows you to enable the Identify function on the map by defining a generic format for all the layers. It is possible to configure a different format for each single layer using the advanced map editor (pencil icon). For more information, see the user guide . If a layer has defined its own Identify format, it will be used instead of the generic one set at the map level.

Annotations.description: Tool to draw annotations on map
Annotations.title: Annotations

AutoMapUpdate.description: Allows the user to update the map (old mapstore version)
AutoMapUpdate.title: Auto Map Update

BurgerMenu.description: Menu on top right of the map that contains other plug-ins
BurgerMenu.title: Burger Menu

Details.description: Allow to show detail card for a map, if any
Details.title: Map Details

Expander.description: Utility for Sidebar (navigation) that allows to hide some buttons
Expander.title: Expander

FilterLayer.description: Allows to add a filter to a layer
FilterLayer.title: Filter Layer

HelpLink.description: A button to access to MapStore documentation
HelpLink.title: Documentation Link

Locate.description: Find and follow the position of the user on the map
Locate.title: Location tool

MapCatalog.description: Allows browsing, editing, deleting and loading of maps that are available on the server
MapCatalog.title: Map Catalog

MapExport.description: Allows to export map in a file
MapExport.title: Map Export

MapImport.description: Allows to import data (SHP, KML/KMZ, GeoJSON, GPX) or reload exported maps.
MapImport.title: Import

MapLoading.description: A spinner in the sidebar that indicates if the map is loading
MapLoading.title: Map Loading Indicator

Measure.description: Allows to measure distances and areas on the map
Measure.title: Measure

MetadataExplorer.description: Browse services (WMS/WMTS/CSW) to add layers to the map
MetadataExplorer.title: Catalog

MousePosition.description: Shows the coordinates of the pointed by the mouse cursor
MousePosition.title: Mouse Position

Print.description: Allows to print the current map with legend
Print.title: Print Tool

Save.description: Allows to save the changes to the map on the server
Save.title: Save

SaveAs.description: Allows to create or clone maps on the server
SaveAs.title: Save As

ScaleBox.description: An indicator and a selector of the current scale of the map
ScaleBox.title: Scale Selector

Settings.description: Allows to edit some settings for the map (language, default info format...)
Settings.title: Settings

Share.description: Allows to share the map in various ways (link, QR-Code, embed, social networks...)
Share.title: Share Tool

TOC.description: Provides a list of layers with an ability to sort them
TOC.title: List of layers

Timeline.description: Allows time travel for data with time dimension
Timeline.title: Timeline

Tutorial.description: Adds a tutorial to explain the various functionalities
Tutorial.title: Tutorial

UserExtensions.description: Allows the user to enable/disable user extensions
UserExtensions.title: User Extensions

UserSession.title: User Session
UserSession.description: Enables an automatically saved user session for every context

Version.description: Shows the version of MapStore in map settings tool
Version.descriptionGeorchestra: Shows the version of GeOrchestra in map settings tool
Version.title: Version

LayerDownload.description: Allows to download data from the Attribute Table
LayerDownload.title: Download Data

Widgets.description: Allows to add and show widgets on map
Widgets.title: Widgets

WidgetsTray.description: A tray to collapse and expand widgets on map.
WidgetsTray.title: Widgets Tray

Globe.description: Sidebar button to toggle 3D mode on/off
Globe.title: 3D

ZoomAll.description: Sidebar button to zoom to the map extent of the map
ZoomAll.title: Zoom To Max Extent

ZoomIn.description: Button that increase zoom level of the map
ZoomIn.title: Zoom In

ZoomOut.description: Button that decrease zoom level of the map
ZoomOut.title: Zoom Out

configurePlugins.label: Configure Plugins
configurePlugins.enabledPluginsEmpty: Add plugins to configuration from list of available plugins
configurePlugins.searchResultsEmpty: No plugins found that satisfy the search criteria

cfgParsingError.title: Configuration Error
cfgParsingError.body:
Configuration JSON parsing failed.
The following error occurred:
"{error}"

configurePlugins.uploadLabel: Drag an extension bundle or click to browse and upload it
configurePlugins.uploadParseError: index.json file index.json has a wrong format
configurePlugins.uploadMissingBundleError: No javascript bundle in uploaded file
configurePlugins.uploadTooManyBundlesError: Too many javascript bundles in the zip package
configurePlugins.uploadWrongFileFormatError: Wrong file format, zip file expected
configurePlugins.uploadAlreadyInstalledError: Extension already installed. Removing current extension before reinstalling
configurePlugins.confirmRemovePlugin: Are you sure you want to remove the extension?

tooltips.enableUserPlugin: Enable selection of current plugin for user
tooltips.disableUserPlugin: Disable selection of current plugin for user
tooltips.activatePlugin: Enable loading this plugin on startup
tooltips.deactivatePlugin: Disable loading this plugin on startup

saveCfgErrorNotification.title: Syntax error in plugin configuration
saveCfgErrorNotification.message: Plugin "{pluginName}" contains an error in configuration. Please fix before proceeding

configureTemplates.title: Configure Templates
configureTemplates.enabledTemplatesEmpty: Add templates to configuration from list of available templates
configureTemplates.searchResultsEmpty: No templates found that satisfy the search criteria

fileDrop.label: Template
fileDrop.clear: Drop or click to select a map template file (exported JSON MapStore maps or WMC files are supported)

configureTemplates.deleteError: Couldn't delete the template, an error occurred
configureTemplates.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete template "{templateName}"?

configureMap.label: Configure Map
configureMap.confirm: This is going to discard all current map changes. Proceed?

saveErrorNotification.conflict: A resource with this name already exists

loadTemplateErrorNotification.forbidden: Couldn't access the template data, the user lacks necessary permissions!

contextCreator.undo: Are you sure you want to abandon the context editing session?

userExtensions.title: User Extensions
userExtensions.emptyDescription: Entered filter does not match name or description of any of extensions

mapTemplates.title: Map Templates
mapTemplates.emptyDescription: Entered filter does not match name or description of any of templates
mapTemplates.confirmReplaceMessage: You will replace all layers and map configuration with the selected template by clicking on replace button

mapCatalog.title: Map Catalog
mapCatalog.deleteConfirmContent: Are you sure you want to delete "{mapName}" map?
mapCatalog.deleteError: Unexpected error occurred while deleting the map
mapCatalog.updateError: Unexpected error occurred while saving the map

tooltips.syncSuccess: Title and description were successfully updated for this layer
tooltips.syncError: It's not possible to update the title and description of this layer. You could verify if all layer options are correct in the settings panel

syncingLayersSavingToServerError.title: Server Saving Error
syncingLayersSavingToServerError.message: An unexpected error occurred when saving updated layers to server

syncingLayersGeneralError.title: General Error
syncingLayersGeneralError.message: An unexpected error occurred during layers syncing. There is probably a bug in MapStore

userSession.confirmRemove: Are you sure you want to restore the default configuration?
